channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: So You’re Underwater: Why Do You See That Circle of Light Above You?
item.description: Snell’s window is one of the coolest phenomena in the natural world. You’ve seen it, but do you know what causes it?

item.title: 360 One lifts its valuation of India’s National Stock Exchange to $29.9B
item.description: 360 One Asset, an investor in National Stock Exchange (NSE), has increased its valuation for India's top stock exchange to $29.9 billion. © 2024 TechC...

item.title: We've Been Testing Fans All Summer and These Are Our 9 Favorites (2024)
item.description: From tower and pedestal styles to utilitarian box fans, we’ve been testing fans all summer, and these are our favorites.

item.title: Get in on the ground floor with Tesla’s humanoid by pretending to be one for pay
item.description: Tesla is hiring individuals standing between 5’7 and 5’11 to carry up to 30 pounds for seven hours a day to train its Optimus robot. © 2024 TechCrunch...

item.title: When War Came to Their Country, They Built a Map
item.description: The Telegram channel and website Deep State uses public data and insider intelligence to power its live tracker of Ukraine’s ever-shifting front line.

item.title: DeepMind workers sign letter in protest of Google’s defense contracts
item.description: At least 200 workers at DeepMind, Google’s AI R&D division, are displeased with Google’s reported defense contracts — and according to Time, they circ...

item.title: How Electric-Vehicle Battery Fires Happen—and How You Should React
item.description: Here’s everything you need to know about lithium-ion battery fires in EVs and what you can do to stay safe if one starts in your car.

item.title: NASA to decide Saturday whether astronauts will ride Boeing’s Starliner home — or use SpaceX’s Dragon instead
item.description: NASA officials will announce their final decision on Saturday as to whether two NASA astronauts — Butch Wilmore and Sunita Williams — will return to E...

item.title: Influencers Take Over the DNC
item.description: At the 2024 Democratic National Convention, influencers boarded yachts, sipped “Midwest Margaritas,” and attended a “Hotties for Harris” event.

item.title: Gimbal Space takes on legacy suppliers with fast-paced component supply chain
item.description: America’s space industry seems mature, but the supply chain that provides all the parts and components for rockets, satellites, and other spacecraft i...
